description: Commands to manage Webpubsub service permissions.

commands.name: az webpubsub service permission check
commands.summary: Check if a connection has permission to the specified group.
commands.syntax:
az webpubsub service permission check --connection-id
                                      --group-name
                                      --hub-name
                                      --permission {joinLeaveGroup, sendToGroup}
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--name]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--subscription]

commands.name: az webpubsub service permission grant
commands.summary: Grant a group permission to the connection. Error throws if operation fails.
commands.syntax:
az webpubsub service permission grant --connection-id
                                      --group-name
                                      --hub-name
                                      --permission {joinLeaveGroup, sendToGroup}
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--name]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--subscription]

commands.name: az webpubsub service permission revoke
commands.summary: Revoke a group permission from the connection. Error throws if operation fails.
commands.syntax:
az webpubsub service permission revoke --connection-id
                                       --group-name
                                       --hub-name
                                       --permission {joinLeaveGroup, sendToGroup}
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--name]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--subscription]
